SEARCH
Package AppointmentOutcomeSystem

Class Prescription

Object
Prescription
public class Prescription extends Object
Represents a prescription associated with an appointment outcome record. Contains details about the medication, dosage, amount, and its current flag status.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Integer
    amount
    Quantity of the medication prescribed.
    private String
    dosage
    Dosage instructions for the medication.
    private Flag
    flag
    Status flag for the prescription, indicating its current state (e.g., PENDING, DISPENSED, etc.).
    private String
    medName
    Name of the medication prescribed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Prescription

      public Prescription(String medName, Integer amount, String dosage)
      Constructs a new Prescription with the specified medication name, amount, and dosage. The flag is set to Flag.PENDING by default.
      Parameters:
      medName - the name of the medication
      amount - the quantity of the medication
      dosage - the dosage instructions for the medication

    • Prescription

      public Prescription(String medName, Flag flag, Integer amount, String dosage)
      Constructs a new Prescription with the specified medication name, flag, amount, and dosage.
      Parameters:
      medName - the name of the medication
      flag - the status flag of the prescription
      amount - the quantity of the medication
      dosage - the dosage instructions for the medication
